name: Imperial Dragon Wyrmling
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Imperial Dragon Wyrmling is a resilient dragon that boasts a sleek form with scales reflecting its elemental affinity, embodying a notable presence in combat.
memorable: Its Lightning Breath ability delivers a devastating area attack that can decimate foes, making it a unique threat in battle.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory or protect its lair from intruders.
relations: Can be found alongside other dragons or elemental beings, often commanding lesser creatures.
environment: Usually inhabits mountainous regions or areas near bodies of water.
strengths: Possesses resistance to lightning and thunder damage, enhancing its durability against certain attacks.
weaknesses: Dexterity is average, making it vulnerable to tactics that exploit its limited mobility.
attacks: Utilizes a strong Bite attack for close combat and a powerful Lightning Breath for ranged area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath creates a 30-foot line of lightning that inflicts significant damage on a failed save.
senses: It has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense creatures within that range without sight.
skills: Notably skilled in Perception with a +5 modifier, making it adept at noticing threats.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water, providing tactical versatility.
Innate ability to cast fog cloud for battlefield control.
Exceptional Strength stat of 19, contributing to its melee prowess.
Has good saving throw capabilities against various effects.
Average prowess in Dexterity and Wisdom.
spellcasting: Can cast fog cloud once per day without material components.
